name: Highway To Galaxy
description:
What is more dumb than the driving coordination test you have to make to renew your drive license? Tighten your seatbelt and dont fall of the road.

Notes: You need to use a dual stick controller to play it

Highway to Galaxy is a small game from a 2017 game jam, the jam theme was "parallel universes" (universos paralelos in spanish, "para lelos" --> for dumb )

We couldnt shake the bad pun from our heads and decided to turn it into a game.

Credits:
